channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The final paid messages: Economy, culture wars and character.

item.title: How ChatGPT Brought Down an Online Education Giant
item.description: Chegg’s stock has dropped 99% as students looking for help with homework defect to AI.

item.title: Trump and Biden to meet in Oval Office on Wednesday
item.description: The tradition of holding such a meeting is not unusual, but it notably did not happen in 2020 after Trump refused to concede he lost the election.

item.title: Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: How Kamala Harris — and Joe Biden — lost to Donald Trump and left Democrats in shambles
item.description: The Democratic Party now finds itself grappling with how it lost so definitively, and how it so thoroughly misunderstood the American electorate.

item.description: Harris has ratcheted up her warnings about the dangers of a second Trump term in recent weeks.

item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.
